main-page.meta-description: Portfolio of Willi MÃ¼ller, software developer for modern, efficient, and sustainable software solutions.
main-page.header-subtitle: Software developer with a focus on fullstack development, as well as practical experience in building and operating self-hosted server infrastructures.
main-page.about-me-p1: I have been fascinated by IT and software development for many years. During my training, I worked on both frontend and backend applications. I am especially intrigued by the interaction of software, infrastructure, and stable systems, which allows complex solutions to be implemented practically.
main-page.about-me-p2: In addition to my training, I carry out my own projects - from web applications and bots to setting up and operating self-hosted server infrastructures. In my home lab, I plan, operate, and automate server services, including my own VPN solutions, Docker setups, and game servers. These projects help me apply and deepen theoretical knowledge in practice.
main-page.about-me-p3: I work in a structured, responsible manner and place value on clean, maintainable code. Teamwork and exchanging technical solutions are natural to me. For my professional future, I am looking for a permanent position where I can further develop my skills and actively contribute to the implementation of modern software solutions.
main-page.blog-post-1-title: Minecraft Server on My Own Home Server
main-page.blog-post-1-desc: Insights into the annual setup of my private Minecraft server.
main-page.blog-post-2-title: Custom Discord Bot for Community Management
main-page.blog-post-2-desc: Development of a versatile bot for moderation, automation, and support of a multilingual Discord server.
main-page.blog-post-3-desc: Developing a professional website to support an MMO Discord server. The platform provides guides, tools to streamline community management and enhance engagement. The project is currently under development.
main-page.blog-post-4-desc: A hands-on report: From the initial idea to development and the finished game.
